properties.title: Save data function now available
properties.description: Users of the Atlas of the Cryosphere can now download the underlying data for each of the layers displayed in the map, including options for data format, map projection, resolution, and cropping to the current map view.

properties.title: Save map function now available
properties.description: Users of the Atlas of the Cryosphere can now save maps as a variety of image formats, including PNG, JPG, GIF, GeoTIFF, KMZ (Google Earth), and others.

properties.title: Antarctic coastlines updated in the Atlas of the Cryosphere
properties.description: The borders used to represent Antarctica in the Atlas of the Cryosphere have been updated with an improved, MODIS-derived set of coastlines (Bohlander and Scambos 2007).

properties.title: Map of Antarctic bedrock elevation now available in Atlas of the Cryosphere
properties.description: The BEDMAP (Lythe and Vaughan 2000) map of Antarctica's bedrock elevation (the elevation of the solid land beneath the ice sheet) is now available in the Atlas of the Cryosphere.

properties.title: Additional deep ice core locations added for Antarctica and Greenland
properties.description: Additional deep ice core locations have been added to the Atlas of the Cryosphere for both the Antarctic and Greenland ice sheets.

properties.title: Web Feature Service (WFS) Version 1.1.0 and Web Coverage Service (WCS) Version 1.1.1 Now Supported
properties.description: Support for the Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) Web Feature Service (WFS) has been upgraded from Version 1.0.0 to 1.1.0. Similarly, Web Coverage Service (WCS) has been upgraded from Version 1.0.0 to 1.1.1.

properties.title: Monthly sea ice climatologies now updated through 2007 in Atlas of the Cryosphere
properties.description: Monthly climatologies of sea ice extent and sea ice concentration in the Atlas of the Cryosphere now include data spanning 1979 through 2007.

properties.title: Blue Marble satellite imagery now available in Atlas of the Cryosphere
properties.description: NASA Earth Observatory's "Blue Marble: Next Generation" satellite imagery are now available in the Atlas of the Cryosphere.

properties.title: Greenland ice sheet surface melt data set now available in Atlas of the Cryosphere
properties.description: A map of the average number of days of surface melt on the Greenland ice sheet between 1979-2004 is now available in the Atlas of the Cryosphere.

properties.title: Additional map projections now supported through Atlas of the Cryosphere WMS and WCS
properties.description: Additional map projections are now supported through the Atlas of the Cryosphere Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) Web Map Service (WMS) and Web Coverage Service (WCS), including several northern hemisphere polar projections recently added in version 6.12 of the European Petroleum Survey Group (EPSG) Geodetic Parameter Dataset.

properties.title: Atlas of the Cryosphere Web Coverage Service (WCS) now available
properties.description: Raster data sources for the Atlas of the Cryosphere are now accessible remotely in GeoTIFF format via the Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) Web Coverage Service (WCS).

properties.title: Atlas of the Cryosphere Web Feature Service (WFS) now available
properties.description: Select vector data sources (i.e. points, lines, and polygons) for the Atlas of the Cryosphere are now accessible remotely via the Open Geospatial Consortium (OGC) Web Feature Service (WFS).

properties.title: Atlas of the Cryosphere now available
properties.description: The National Snow and Ice Data Center (NSIDC) Atlas of the Cryosphere web mapping site is now available (http://nsidc.org/data/atlas). View dynamic, online maps of snow, sea ice, glaciers, ice sheets, permafrost, and more, for both the Northern and Southern Hemispheres.
